description: Gets the ID of the certificate that is currently associated with a wireless gateway.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource to get.

nested_items.name: IotCertificateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the certificate associated with the wireless gateway.

nested_items.name: LoRaWANNetworkServerCertificateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the certificate that is associated with the wireless gateway and used for the LoRaWANNetworkServer endpoint.
